Class LonghornNetworkGUI.UserInfoWindow

java.lang.Object
LonghornNetworkGUI.UserInfoWindow
Enclosing class:
LonghornNetworkGUI
private class LonghornNetworkGUI.UserInfoWindow extends Object
This class implements the user information window that displays the relevant information of a student. As mentioned in its respective constructor comment.
Version:
1.0 Beta
Author:
Abdon Morales, am226923, abdonmorales@my.utexas.edu

      public UserInfoWindow(UniversityStudent student)
